name: Ursalord, the Thousand-Pierced Bear
description: A creature vast as a building. Its body a wall of muscle wrapped in ancient, rust-caked armor, jagged with broken weapons embedded deep in its hide. One half of its face is stripped to bone and horn, and black ichor drips steadily from its maw. Four eyes glow faintly, alien and merciless.
motives: Hunt silently, ambush, terrify, shatter, feast

features.title: Relentless (2)
features.description: The Ursalord can be spotlighted up to two times times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.title: Rampaging Fury
features.description: Spend a Fear to make a standard attack against all targets within Very Close range.

features.title: Meteor Swipe
features.description: Mark a Stress to shatter a building and heave the debris at all targets in front of the Ursalord within Far range. Make an attack against these targets. Targets the Ursalord succeeds against take 1d10+2 physical damage. If they succeed against more than one target, you gain a Fear.

features.title: Terrifying Roar
features.description: When the Ursalord marks 2 or more HP, Mark a Stress to cause all PCs within Far range to make a Presence Reaction Roll (13). Targets who fail lose a Hope and you gain a Fear for each. Targets who succeed must mark a Stress.
